ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: Writhing is good if you have 1 hand blunt.. If you are 20th with maxed 2h and a 1 in 1h the observer is better.  http://members.door.net/enigma
ygData.messageBody:
Writhing is good if you have 1 hand blunt.. If you are 20th with maxed 2h
and a 1 in 1h the observer is better.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Tom Matthews [SMTP:tmatthews@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 11:12 PM
To: EQ_Tinkering@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] rumors

From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>

Just my opinion.....

dlobdell wrote:

> From: "dlobdell" <dlobdell@...>
>
> No, the lens quest he refers to, and the lens quest for the Observer
staff is different. The observer staff quest is given out at the
observatory North of the Windmills, where as the other lens quest is given
by the observitory by Akanon. And just for the record the Obeserver staff
is NOT the best staff in the game for mage classes.. The Staff of Writhing
is much better+ACE- It casts random chaotic feedbacks... and its has some
nice +- stats too. Cant remember them all exacly. Ill look next time i log
on. I havnt been playing much lately...

Observer Staff 2H
Damage 12
Delay 35
Ratio 342
Intelligence +5
Wisdom +5
Mana +30
48 Charges of Sentinel Enchanter spell, warns while meditating

Staff of Writhing 1H
Damage 9
Delay 33
Ratio 273
Chaotic Feedback upto 48 damage when successful

First they are two different styles of weapon but the Observer staff is
much more deadly, not in melee power but at level 30 (or thereabouts) when
you can get either staff the Observer staff adds 60 mana with bonus mana
and bonus intelligence and it only goes up with levels. Just one more thing
personally I would rather carry a Black Tome with Silver Runes and a
Glowing Black Stone at that level......

Tome
Mana +30
Intelligence +4

Stone
Intelligence +9
Save Magic +10

That would be around 120 extra mana at level 30. I will let the tanks hit,
I rather have a few "roots" left in me then rather to be able to hope to
get good shot in with mobs that hit for 100 points of dmg.
